channel.title: Synaesthesia on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Synaesthesia on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Color coded words
item.description: When you bought your textbooks, did you evaluate them on how well color-coded the highlighting was in the used copies? If someone before you had turned the page into an angry fruit salad, the value of the text diminished. If instead they were careful and methodical and deft with the use of their marker, the text would be that much easier to read. I’m experimenting with color-coding here, in particular in three ways.
